standard.description: These are standards to maintain Accessibility.

test.query_clob:
select case when eba_stds_parser.valid_html_yn(aapic.report_label) = 'N'
            then 'N'
            when aapic.html_expression is not null 
            then eba_stds_parser.valid_html_yn(aapic.html_expression)
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapic.application_id, 
       aapic.page_id,
       aapic.created_by,
       aapic.created_on,
       aapic.updated_by last_updated_by,
       aapic.updated_on last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has malformed HTML [HTML expression `%3`, label : `%4`]', 
        p0 => aapic.column_alias, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id,
        p3 => aapic.html_expression,
        p4 => aapic.report_label) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has malformed HTML', 
        p0 => aapic.column_alias, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id) issue_title,
       aapic.column_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapic.column_alias,
       aapic.report_label,
       aapic.display_text_as,
       aapic.html_expression,
       aapic.workspace
from apex_application_page_ir_col aapic
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapic.page_id and aap.application_id = aapic.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapic.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapic.application_id
where aapic.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
Checking Column for matching HTML tags. This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  4.1.1(A) : Parsing : In content implemented using markup languages, elements have complete start and end tags, elements are nested according to their specifications, elements do not contain duplicate attributes, and any IDs are unique, except where the specifications allow these features.
